mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project(course_ID, name, start_time, end_time, description, percentage, teacher_ID) VALUES (#{course_ID}, #{name},#{start_time}, #{end_time},#{description}, #{percentage},#{teacher_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project WHERE course_ID = #{course_ID} and name = #{name}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM project WHERE course_ID=#{course_ID} and name = #{name}
